message: Berhasil melakukan simulasi Fisher Yates + Graph Coloring

listPaket.question: Which statement best explains the periods of the Gupta Empire of India, the Golden Age of Greece, and the Renaissance in Italy?
option: the winning of a war often inspires scientific and artistic achievement
a combination of wealth and a time of relative peace often leads to cultural achievement
a dictatorship usually encourages cultural growth and development
periods of censorship are needed for a nation to achieve cultural and scientific greatness

listPaket.question: The French Revolution, the Bolshevik Revolution in Russia, and the Communist Revolution in China were similar in that all three
option: brought about few political changes
were influenced by the peasants  desire for more land
were inspired by Marxism
were supported primarily by the nobility

listPaket.question: One way in which Medieval European society, Latin American colonial society, and society in Imperial China were similar is that each
option: placed great value on public education
experienced a surplus of skilled labor
was organized according to a rigid class structure
de-emphasized the role of religion

listPaket.question: Eighteenth-century Russia and nineteenth-century Japan were similar in that both countries
option: began the process of modernization after a long period of isolation
developed democratic governments after years under absolute monarchies
refused to accept western technological ideas
adopted socialist economic systems after capitalism had failed

listPaket.question: The French Revolution of 1789 and the Cuban Revolution of 1959 were similar in that both were caused primarily by the
option: desire of the people to be free from foreign rule
pressure of religious leaders for government reform
failure of the government to meet the needs of the people
ambition of the upper class to attain wealth and property

listPaket.question: In China, the building of the Great Wall, the use of the tribute system, and the government s support of the Boxer Rebellion are examples of attempts by different dynasties to limit
option: foreign influence
nationalism
communist expansion
industrialization

listPaket.question: One similarity between the decline of the Roman Empire and the fall of the Manchu Dynasty was that both initially led to
option: improved economic conditions
democratically elected governments
political chaos and decentralization of government
major accomplishments in art, science, and technology

listPaket.question: Which was characteristic of France under Napoleon s rule and Germany under Hitler s rule?
option: democratic ideas and diversity were encouraged
authoritarian control and a strong sense of nationalism prevailed
peaceful relations with neighboring countries wee fostered
artistic and literary freedom flourished

listPaket.question: Which idea did Napoleon Bonaparte, Sun Yat-Sen, and Simone Bolivar have in common?
option: divine right
nationalism
totalitarianism
nonviolence

listPaket.question: The Tamils in Sri Lanka, the Sikhs in India, and the Zulus in South Africa have all attempted to
option: establish colonies in Asia
practice passive resistance
achieve political separatism
encourage mercantilism

listPaket.question: Changes in Russia under Peter the Great were most similar to changes that occurred in
option: China before the Opium War
Japan during the Meiji Restoration
Iran after the fall of Shah Pahlevi
France during the feudal period

listPaket.question: During the Middle Ages, Europeans did not eat potatoes or corn because these vegetables
option: were forbidden by the Catholic Church for religious reasons
had not yet been introduced to Europe from the New World
were believed to be poisonous
were too expensive to import from China

listPaket.question: Until the 1500 s, China and Japan were similar in that both
option: were invaded by the Mongols
welcomed Christian Missionaries
had little contact with Western European nations
were developing democratic traditions

listPaket.question: One way in which Medieval European society, Latin American colonial society, and society in Imperial China were similar is that each
option: placed great value on public education
experienced a surplus of skilled labor
was organized according to a rigid class structure
de-emphasized the role of religion

listPaket.question: A study of the French Revolution and the Russian Revolution of 1917 would lead to the conclusion that
option: revolutions only occur when a majority of citizens become directly involved
university students are most often responsible for starting revolutions
control of revolutions often shifts from moderates to radicals
revolutions seldom result in long-term changes

listPaket.question: The ancient Greek city-state of Sparta and the Soviet Union under Stalin were similar in that both societies
option: were primarily concerned with the health of their people
were powerful military states
granted universal suffrage to their people
placed great emphasis on literature and the arts

listPaket.question: Eighteenth-century Russia and nineteenth-century Japan were similar in that both countries
option: began the process of modernization after a long period of isolation
developed democratic governments after years under absolute monarchies
refused to accept western technological ideas
adopted socialist economic systems after capitalism had failed

listPaket.question: In the Ancient Kingdom of Mali and in the Roman Republic, an important feature of life was the development of
option: codified laws
social and political equality
the Islamic religion
agricultural communes

listPaket.question: The societies of traditional China, Feudal Japan, and Czarist Russia were all characterized by
option: a rigid class structure
much interaction with other cultures
great economic change
rapidly changing social values

listPaket.question: The Japanese feudal system and the Hindu caste system are similar in that both systems
option: promoted social mobility
developed a rigid class structure
encouraged the people to take part in government
resulted in economic opportunities for the lower classes

listPaket.question: Until the 1500 s, China and Japan were similar in that both
option: were invaded by the Mongols
welcomed Christian Missionaries
had little contact with Western European nations
were developing democratic traditions
